Articles.Content:
[glow=red,2,300][move]WARNING! NONE OF THESE PARTS ARE MADE AT THIS POINT! PLEASE WAIT UNTIL COOLY568\'S COMPUTER IS FIXED! THESE MODELS MOST LIKELY WILL NOT LOOK PRETTY WHEN THEY ARE MADE BECAUSE I AM NOT A MODELER![/move]

Most of you can already see I had a little fun making this post. :3

Welcome to,

[glow=red,2,300]2012 Inc.[/glow]

Sorry for horrible logo, will update soon!

Have you ever been scared in KSP when A huge, giant meteor is heading for Kerbal?

Fear no more, thanks to 2012 Inc.

We manufacture parts to save you from meteors and other ghastly things lurking in the Kerbol system.

To Be Modeled, And Textured

If the Apocalypse prevention tools are not enough to save your planet buy the Planet evacuation pack!

To Be Modeled, And Textured

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome To

[glow=red,4,600]HGL.Corp[/glow]

Again, horrible logo.

Have you ever felt your rocket didn\'t have the right landing legs?

YEAH!

Well look no further than HGL.Corp

We manufacture static and movable landing legs!

WHAAATT?

Thats RIGHT!

Heavy duty legs, light legs, dual legs, triple legs, EVEN MONSTER LEGS!

WHAT?

Buy yours today!

Here.

To be Textured, And Modeled.
Why just a placeholder? o_O

When you actually have some parts released, we can move this to the proper forum. Until then, you can continue to create your post here.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
Yeah, my computer is non-functioning at the moment. Expect models tonight, hopefully.

winning!!!!

cant wait to see this
Good. Now we have stuff to save kerbin from. XD
There already are asteroids as a plugin, they even have gravity...
I NEW DAT! (Bad Grammer ???)
For those who don\'t: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10857.0

Okay, I\'m gonna start modeling parts right now! 8)

Nope, computer won\'t let me. :\'(
Okay, hopefully my computer will regain windows 7 this weekend, then I can model the parts. (I\'m dying to start modeling!)

Okay, hopefully my computer will regain windows 7 this weekend, then I can model the parts. (I\'m dying to start modeling!)

What\'d you do to your computer, accidentally Fat Man the harddrive?

What\'d you do to your computer, accidentally Fat Man the harddrive?

Naaa, I changed to Vista to fix a blue screen problem. Vista wouldn\'t run blender.

Luckily I am running windows 7 now.
Going off the video above... Could an individual make a planet?

Going off the video above... Could an individual make a planet?

No. You can\'t make planets out of parts.
Sounds awesome!

Going off the video above... Could an individual make a planet?

Unfortunately, parts can only be a maximum of 2km wide, which isn\'t really enough for a planet.
But it COULD be big enough for a randomly generated broken down ship for you to rescue, which would be made all the better by adding docking...

But it COULD be big enough for a randomly generated broken down ship for you to rescue, which would be made all the better by adding docking...

That\'s a great idea

When I get back from California I will start making the pack.

I will include some persistance files with asteroids, comets, stranded ships on asteroids, ETC.
